channel.title: Problem when run server :/
channel.description: When i run server in the source that say this Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "3088 3494" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:65) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:492) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:527) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:4045) at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:64) Plz help me

item.title: Problem when run server :/
item.dc:creator: @vManlyMan vManlyMan
item.description:
@vManlyMan wrote:

[quote=“leonscape, post:7, topic:430365”][quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=533048.msg3896290#msg3896290 date=1327338765]

I have the same problem but know one helps if theres no rep involved

You’re an idiot.

dont hate coz ur fat n ugly

You’re expecting help when you name all of your topics, “NEED HELP!@!!@#@!!!1”. Then you bitch when you don’t get it. And you have the worst grammar ever.
[/quote]

well fisrt i name it help for a reson figure it out and second grammer dnt matter as i am shortining what i say[/quote]

well fsrt u shud jst w8 moar den 10 mins fer helpz b4 yu maek a knew topic axing 4 h3lp. secnd gramer do matar becuz yew sound leik a fkin reta12d wen yu type leik diz.

item.title: Problem when run server :/
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Someone edited npc.cfg or spaw-config.cfg. When you edit those .cfg files for any server (that I know of), you MUST you the Tab button over spaces or you get that error. Looks like spawn-config so search for the line with the numbers in the error given to you and redo it with tabs.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem when run server :/

java:65)
